data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains the microsatellite genotypes and social group coordinates for each badger, used to reconstruct the pedigree. Includes badger identity (ID), latitude and longitude (Lat, Lng) and genotypes at each of 22 microsatellite markers (two columns per locus, a & b denote each allele, e.g. Mel101a, Mel101b)
